description:
An anti-greenwashing law in Canada compelled polluters to scrub misleading content. Could a new bill in Pennsylvania set an example for the United States?

The post How U.S. governments could crack down on greenwashing appeared first on DeSmog.
title: How U.S. governments could crack down on greenwashing

description:
Move comes after federal court pulls project’s FERC approvals, citing too vague carbon capture plans and environmental impacts on Texas communities.

The post NextDecade Scraps Carbon Capture Plans for Its Rio Grande LNG Terminal appeared first on DeSmog.
title: NextDecade Scraps Carbon Capture Plans for Its Rio Grande LNG Terminal
